newsitem.title: POLAND: Warsaw bourse clears Bank Komunalny for main floor.
newsitem.headline: Warsaw bourse clears Bank Komunalny for main floor.

text.p: The Warsaw Bourse's board cleared shares of Bank Komunalny SA w Gdyni for trade on the main market, it said in a statement.
The bourse also cleared 1.25 million D series shares of PPABank SA for trade on the main floor.
It said, however, that confectioner Jutrzenka SA did not fulfil requirements to move from the parallel market to the main floor.
